New Records: Gareth Delany scored the highest score of 26 in Ireland's innings
Key Match Events: Arshdeep Singh removed the openers cheaply
Jasprit Bumrah was unplayable with extra zip, a tight length and swing
Hardik Pandya scalped three wickets with a hint of late movement and accurate bowling
Rohit Sharma reached his 30th T20I fifty
Virat Kohli was dismissed for 1 off 5 balls
Gareth Delany was run out due to a horror mix up with Ben White
Rohit Sharma retired hurt after being struck on the shoulder
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Nassau County International Cricket Stadium surface offered uneven bounce and exaggerated movement
The match was played on a minefield of a pitch
A tighter contest would have been more befitting of the grand occasion
